Text: I'm having a network problem with incoming connections. Right now seeding to two hosts so if they stay on as seeds then it should be OK. I'll check it when I return home.

Great. I get a -1 because of network problems after spending two weeks resubtitling this.

Ungrateful asshole whoever you are.
Thanks a million, man! I never thought I'd ever find this! If I managae to download it completely, I'll seed it for as long as I can.
@Surfari_Master: Thank you. :^) I've returned to reseed this movie several times because people keep leeching it more than they send, so it's much appreciated and you have made it worthwhile!
Please pretty please seed this again. I had this movie stored in a (now broken) external disk. I'm now stuck at 63.7%. Thanks a million in advance.
